definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: My English grandma saw my mum plant so many courgette and thought it was a bit strange.
sentences.chinese: 我奶奶见我妈种那么多西葫芦，觉得奇怪。

sentences.english: The courgette struck the bear on the head, scaring it away
sentences.chinese: 这就是击中黑熊头部，并把它吓跑的西葫芦。

sentences.english: Tasty bannock bread, not as sweet as zucchini bread.
sentences.chinese: 鲜美大饼面包，并不如甜面包作为西葫芦。

sentences.english: Vegetable choices go all the way from artichokes to zucchini.
sentences.chinese: 常吃的蔬菜各色各样，从洋蓟到绿皮密生西葫芦。

sentences.english: Examples include — salad greens, asparagus, green beans, broccoli and zucchini.
sentences.chinese: 包括有沙拉蔬菜，芦笋，青豆，西兰花和西葫芦。

sentences.english: Clean and slice the zucchini . Cut the chicken into thin slices and mix with marinade.
sentences.chinese: 西葫芦洗净切成薄片，鸡肉切片后，加入腌料拌匀。

sentences.english: A new summer squash f1hybrid-'jinghu no.
sentences.chinese: 西葫芦新品种京葫1号的选育。

sentences.english: Fruit of certain varieties of Cucurbita pepo or C. moschata, of the gourd family.
sentences.chinese: 葫芦科西葫芦或番瓜某些品种的果实。

sentences.english: Betty: Because they call it courgette .
One good approach: Add chopped yellow squash and zucchini to store-bought salsa.
sentences.chinese: 然后将切碎的黄色南瓜和西葫芦储存在萨尔萨里。

sentences.english: Anyway, dumplings with courgette are also very tasty.
sentences.chinese: 再说，西葫芦包饺子也很好吃的。

definition: eggplant (Solanum melongena L.)/aubergine/brinjal/Guinea squash/phonetic "cheese" (when being photographed)/equivalent of "say cheese"
variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
cabbage (round cabbage most commonly found in Western countries)
